message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $10,750?  That's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to my desired price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,000 and $11,500, which would be $10,750 is too high, so I'll go with $10,250. That's the most I can afford.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,250 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is a fair compromise. This is the lowest I can go, so let me know what you think.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,250, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me at $10,250?
